name: classification
author: Siemens Product Lifecycle Management Software Inc.

isShowClearActive.expression: ctx.classifyCreate || conditions.isSaveActive || ctx.clsPanel.updateMode || conditions.isStandAloneCmdSelected || ctx.pasteInProgress === true

secondaryWorkareaTabs.visibleWhen: ( !ctx.clsLocation.showStandalone || ctx.clsLocation.showStandalone === undefined || ctx.clsLocation.showStandalone === null ) && selection.length === 0 && ctx.sublocation.nameToken === 'com_siemens_splm_classificationLocation:showClassificationSubLocation' && !ctx.clsLocation.showParentVnc

( !ctx.clsLocation.showStandalone || ctx.clsLocation.showStandalone === undefined || ctx.clsLocation.showStandalone === null ) && selection.length === 0 && ctx.sublocation.nameToken === 'com_siemens_splm_classificationLocation:showClassificationSubLocation' && ctx.clsLocation.showParentVnc === true
